name: topresults1.png
copy: The top results page, which is shown to the user after a standard search. (Here, no query is input.) Page results appear first, but this behavior is customizable on the WordPress admin. The number of results displayed for each block of this view can also be customized.

name: results-rainier.png
copy: Another top results view, with the search term 'rainier'. In coordination with design, the thumbnails are designed to take advantage of the beautiful photography.

name: results-rainier2.png
copy: A scrolled down view of the 'rainier' results, showing the partner listings. Since partners must pay for inclusion, these are larger than other thumbnails and designed to be eye-catching.

name: topresults-iphone.png
copy: The top results search landing page, as seen on extra small screens (like mobile phones).

name: topresults-ipad.png
copy: The top results search landing page, as seen on small screens (like tablets).

name: topresults-ipad2.png
copy: A scrolled-down view of the search landing page, as seen on a tablet. This is the narrowest width that shows this view.

name: filter-desktop2.png
copy: Users can filter the search results to show only a certain result type. Here, the results are being filtered to only include local business listings.

name: results-rainier-partners.png
copy: Search results, filtered to only show local businesses. Many data types have additional filters specific to that type, which display after the type has been selected. Here, the business sub-filters can be seen.

name: filter-desktop.png
copy: The local business results filter includes a region sub-filter. Multiple regions can be chosen via checkbox. For convenience, when hovering over the sub filter lists, the user is provided with a quick link to refine the search.

name: filter-mobile.png
copy: The mobile filter view. It appears as an layer over the main page, to allow the user sufficient room to view and understand their options.
